import{db}from'../../firebase';// sending the product and its data to cart
function sendData(product){// adding the product data to cart database 
db.collection("cart").add({category:product.category,desc:product.desc,key:product.key,price:product.price,qty:1,title:product.title,img:product.img})// after clicking on add to cart btn alert message will show 
.then(function(docRef){alert("Data Successfully Submitted");});}export default sendData;
